title: Did Mike Pines welcome a wide display of rainbow flags for lesbian, gay, bisexual and transgender people in Iceland?
subtitle: The Vice-President of the United States received protests against the visit to two European countries in September 2019.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: American Vice President Mike Pines was welcomed through a wide-ranging display of rainbow flags for lesbian, gay, bisexual and transgender persons in his visit to Reykjavik, Iceland, in September 2019.
